meanings.sent1: The stench of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The garbage had a terrible stench.
meanings.sent3: The stench from the old shoes was so bad, we had to hold our noses.
meanings.sent4: The stench of failure hung heavy in the air.
meanings.sent5: The stench of the skunk was overpowering.

meanings.definition: To emit a strong and unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The garbage began to stench after a few days.
meanings.sent2: The flowers stench in the hot sun.
meanings.sent3: The cheese started to stench, making everyone gag.
meanings.sent4: The fish stenched up the whole kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The dirty laundry stenched up the entire room.
